# Red for Publishers

## Example

```html
<amp-ad width="320" height="150" type="rfp" data-adspot-id="XXXXXXXX"> </amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact https://www.fout.co.jp/freakout/contact/.

### Required parameters

-   `data-adspot-id`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-stylesheet-url`
-   `data-country`
